price: A na Dan kad ih On pozove i upita: “Šta ste poslanicima odgovorili?”,
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
